column4: How would anyone like to help me configure my wireless?! Because i feel like i'm in a foreig country and don't speak the language
and it just doesnt want to work! arg
what kind of wireless card is it?
i don't think its my card because iwconfig gives me the correct MAC address and SSID of my router
hmm, i'm not sure how to detect the card
no IP is that even possible?
have you looked at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/WirelessCardsSupported yet?
i don't think its a card support issue. i can see my router :\
hm, so what's the problem then?
like, you can go to 192.168.0.1 ?
i can not
when you click on the network manager applet thing do you see an option for wireless network?
do you see any network under there?
my network will show up, but im connected under the manager
what manager?
my network will show up, and accepts the WPA key
nothing will come up in the browser
i'm sorry, if that's the case i don't think i can help you with that, i thought you were trying to setup the wireless card like i did a couple days ago
thanks for trying
checked the forums yet?
imo it's better for posting specific problems
